s3compatinstitutions_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to S3compat (for Institutions) in ${node}
s3compatinstitutions_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in S3compat (for Institutions) in ${node}
s3compatinstitutions_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in S3compat (for Institutions) in ${node}
s3compatinstitutions_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the S3compat (for Institutions) addon for ${node}
s3compatinstitutions_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the S3compat (for Institutions) addon for ${node}
